code: import axios from'../config/axios';export var setLends=function setLends(lends){return{type:'SET_LENDS',payload:lends};};export var startSetLends=function startSetLends(){return function(dispatch){axios.get('/lends',{headers:{'x-auth':localStorage.getItem('x-auth')}}).then(function(response){var lends=response.data;if(Array.isArray(lends)){dispatch(setLends(lends));}}).catch(function(err){console.log(err);});};};export var addLend=function addLend(lend){return{type:'ADD_LEND',payload:lend};};export var startAddLend=function startAddLend(formData){return function(dispatch){axios.post('/lends',formData,{headers:{'x-auth':localStorage.getItem('x-auth')}}).then(function(response){if(typeof response.data==='object'){dispatch(addLend(response.data));}}).catch(function(err){console.log(err);});};};var editLend=function editLend(lend){return{type:'EDIT_LEND',payload:lend};};export var startEditLend=function startEditLend(id,formData){return function(dispatch){axios.put("/lends/".concat(id),formData,{headers:{'x-auth':localStorage.getItem('x-auth')}}).then(function(response){if(typeof response.data==='object'){dispatch(editLend(response.data));}}).catch(function(err){console.log(err);});};};export var startTrashAndStarLends=function startTrashAndStarLends(formData){return function(dispatch){axios.put('/lends',formData,{headers:{'x-auth':localStorage.getItem('x-auth')}}).then(function(response){var lends=response.data;if(Array.isArray(lends)){dispatch(setLends(lends));}}).catch(function(err){console.log(err);});};};export var startDeleteTrashLends=function startDeleteTrashLends(formData){return function(dispatch){axios.put('/lends_delete',formData,{headers:{'x-auth':localStorage.getItem('x-auth')}}).then(function(response){var lends=response.data;if(Array.isArray(lends)){dispatch(setLends(lends));}}).catch(function(err){console.log(err);});};};
